meanings.definition: A person who supports a particular party, person, or set of ideas.
meanings.sent1: As an adherent of the environmental movement, she always recycled and used reusable bags.
meanings.sent2: The political adherent campaigned tirelessly for their chosen candidate.
meanings.sent3: The adherent of healthy eating snuck a salad into the fast-food restaurant.
meanings.sent4: Like a loyal adherent, he never missed a single rally for his favorite politician.
meanings.sent5: She was such a dedicated adherent that she had a bumper sticker of her party's logo on her car.

meanings.definition: Sticking fast to an object or surface.
meanings.sent1: The adherent tape kept the poster securely on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The paint was so adherent that it didn't peel off easily.
meanings.sent3: The adherent sticker refused to come off the laptop no matter how hard he tried.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as adherent as glue, never letting go.
meanings.sent5: The adherent mud clung stubbornly to the bottom of her shoes.
